author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Migrate the `NVProfilerService` to NVTXv3.

Monitor the Transformer signals:
  - prefetching
  - acquire
  - transform

#### PR validation:

Tested on a simple cmsRun configuration:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6f2f84eb-775b-43e9-8005-47020a555469)
title: Update NVProfilerService to NVTXv3 and monitor Transformer signals
